description.displayText:
My husband and I hired Quiana on a trial basis as a part-time nanny for my autistic daughter. She was aware of her responsibilities before accepting the position, and we provided in-home training from our behaviorist to ensure a smooth transition. 

Throughout the time that she worked with my daughter, she often arrived late, did not respond well to feedback, and most recently just stopped showing up with no call, text, or explanation. 

Overall, Quiana has proven unreliable, inconsiderate, and unprofessional; I do not recommend hiring her to care for anyone's children.
description.originalText:
My husband and I hired Quiana on a trial basis as a part-time nanny for my autistic daughter. She was aware of her responsibilities before accepting the position, and we provided in-home training from our behaviorist to ensure a smooth transition. 

Throughout the time that she worked with my daughter, she often arrived late, did not respond well to feedback, and most recently just stopped showing up with no call, text, or explanation. 

Overall, Quiana has proven unreliable, inconsiderate, and unprofessional; I do not recommend hiring her to care for anyone's children.
